artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 245, horizontal ōban #55.02, variant
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings:
Combined red censor and publisher seal: Kiwame
Publisher:Ho_eido_
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
text:
No. 02 in the series, second version, with altered subtitle; published by Hōeidō alone.
Four more figures were added to the later edition including two porters, and a spear holder.
title: Shinagawa: Departure of a Daimyō
